How to get Year, Month and Day out of SQL Date in SQL Server by Amr Saafan
posts.caption: amrsaafan.blogspot.com
posts.description: Let is say that we have the following Date 2007-04-05 10:13:14.109 and we want to get Year, Month and Day out of this date. There is a function named DATEPART() that can be used to archive this.

For Android developers, I have set of items the i will retrieve from database and want to display them in a list and the items should be click-able ??
Any Help ?

hello guys .. I was wondering about copyrights of open source projects .. let's assume that I have this wonderful library that is hosted on one of the famous code hosting vendors .. codeplex, github, etc.

could this be enough to retain my copyright as an author ?!!!

should I reserve a specific domain name for the code ?!!

is there a foundation that could connect my identity to my work and ensure my copyrights ??

looking for your insights pleaase :)
